definition: Rice (name)/Condoleezza Rice (1954-) US Secretary of State 2005-2009
to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

pinyin: Ke4 lai4 si1 te4 che4 qi2

definition: Condoleezza Rice (1954-), US Secretary of State 2005-2009
pinyin: Kang1 duo1 li4 zha1 · Lai4 si1

sentences.english: Mr. President, Condoleeza Rice is here to see you.
sentences.chinese: 總統先生，賴斯女士想和你通話。

sentences.english: Secretary of State Condoleezza Rice squeezed in some ice time while in Russia.
sentences.chinese: 在俄羅斯美國國務卿賴斯擠出一些時間在冰場上。

sentences.english: Rice called it "a place of hope".
sentences.chinese: 賴斯說這是一座希望之城。

sentences.english: Christchurch on the South Island and Queenstown, further to the south.
sentences.chinese: 南部克賴斯物徹奇和南方遙遠的昆士城。

sentences.english: Something Rusan Rice will be spared this time around.
sentences.chinese: 這次賴斯要全力以赴的做些事情。

sentences.english: Rice said Moscow must abide by its stated promise to halt military operations.
sentences.chinese: 賴斯說，莫斯科必須遵守其停止軍事行動的承諾。

sentences.english: The epicenter was 56 km from Christchurch.
sentences.chinese: 震中距克賴斯特徹奇市56公里。

sentences.english: After Forestier's death, he and Mrs. Forestier kept a vigil over the corpse.
sentences.chinese: 弗賴斯節死後，杜洛瓦同弗賴斯節夫人一起守靈。

sentences.english: After Forestier's death, he and Mrs. Forestier kept a vigil over the corpse.
sentences.chinese: 弗賴斯節死後，杜洛瓦同弗賴斯節夫人一起守靈。

sentences.english: “We’ve gotten very good at biocontainment, ” Race says.
sentences.chinese: “我們已經在生物控制方面做得很好了，”賴斯說。

sentences.english: THEY SAT in the middle of a small lake fed by the waters of Brices Creek.
sentences.chinese: 他們停在一個由布賴斯小溪注水的小湖。

sentences.english: Secretary of State Condoleezza Rice - who canceled foreign travel plans - is leading U.S. diplomatic efforts.
sentences.chinese: 國務卿賴斯取消出國訪問，她正領導美國的外交努力。

sentences.english: Rande Janus sells locally made macarons at his store, the Wine Cabinet, in Reston, Virginia.
sentences.chinese: 他的商店位於弗吉尼亞州賴斯頓，名爲酒櫃。

sentences.english: Rice is in China for a two-day stop to promote relations between the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 賴斯正在對中國進行兩天訪問，以促進美中兩國關係。

sentences.english: The Derek de Solla Price Award is an international award in the field of scientometrics.
sentences.chinese: 普賴斯獎是科學計量學領域的國際獎項。

two simultaneous happy events in the family
